links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6, -15, 20, -15, 6, -1).
formula: Number of 8-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 3 contiguous pairs; g.f. 2*(2+3x)*x/(1-x)^6; 2*A006470.a(n) = C(n+1, 2)*C(n+3, 3) - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 10 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 13 2016a(1)=4, a(2)=30, a(3)=120, a(4)=350, a(5)=840, a(6)=1764, a(n)= 6*a(n-1)- 15*a(n-2)+20*a(n-3)-15*a(n-4)+6*a(n-5)-a (n-6). - _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 20 2015
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
